means: 轻重量级拳击手，重量级拳击手

sentence.Network_en: No other cruiserweight in the world carries the kind of reputation that Rey Mysterio does.

entry.def: A cruiserweight is another name for a light heavyweight .

means.word_mean: 1. a professional boxer who weighs between 169 and 175 pounds

auth_sentence.content: If it doesn't then I've been undisputed cruiserweight champion of the world and a heavyweight champion of the world.

auth_sentence.content: In Hamburg, Panama's Guillermo Jones stopped Firat Arslan of Germany to win the WBA cruiserweight title.

auth_sentence.content: Haye started off as a cruiserweight and beat Jean-Marc Mormeck in Paris in 2007 to land the WBC title.
